lst.name: sentence
lst.str: There have been several arrests, property damage, and sometimes violent clashes between strikers and replacement workers whom the corporation hired to try and keep the mail moving.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: CUPW President Jean-Claude Parrot called for the resignation of Andre Harvie, minister responsible for Canada Post, for condoning the use of the so-called strikebreakers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The government is expected to respond quickly to the request that was made after the union formally rejected the corporation's latest offer to settle the four-day-old dispute.
